subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Brendan Bell broke a tie with 3 minutes 4 seconds left, and the Rangers earned a preseason split with the Devils with a 4-3 victory on Friday in Newark.
snippet: Defenseman Brendan Bell broke a tie with 3 minutes 4 seconds left, and the Rangers earned a preseason split with the Devils with a 4-3 victory on Friday in Newark.
